fields.brochure_text:
**Special offer:**

Receive a complimentary continental breakfast on a morning of your choice for up to 40 guests, worth over 400 euros!

_Terms and conditions apply. Offer valid until 30th September 2025._

**Wedding inspiration photos:**
<https://firehorsephotographyfrance.com/journal/niamh-amp-matt-chateau-du-raysse-come-on-barbie-lets-go-party>
<https://lydiataylorjones.pixieset.com/rachelandjamespreviews/>
<https://bit.ly/3AmOvd8>
<https://www.seijimoristudio.com/galerie/rachel-ben-mariage/>
<https://bit.ly/3PJYsXF>
<https://bit.ly/3PM7KTf>
<https://bit.ly/3wshNG3>

Instagram: <https://www.instagram.com/chateauduraysse/>

**Overview of the Raysse Estate:**

Booking with Château du Raysse includes complete exclusive access to the Estate. The Raysse Estate comprises of the Château, the Maison du Parc and the Pigeonnier apartment. In total we offer 15 beautiful and unique ensuite bedrooms and then another two bedrooms with one bathroom in the apartment. We can comfortably sleep up to 38 guests.

[Bedroom details](https://chateauduraysse.com/rooms-at-the-raysse-estate/)

During your stay, you and your guests can enjoy two kitchens, dining area, library/living room, hall, two swimming pools and beautiful grounds.

[Outside spaces](https://chateauduraysse.com/outside-spaces-at-chateau-du-raysse/)
[Reception rooms](https://chateauduraysse.com/reception-rooms-at-chateau-du-raysse/)
[Floorplan](https://chateauduraysse.com/download-floorplan/)

If you need extra accommodation for additional guests, we work directly with our neighbours who have a beautiful holiday villa available for another 10 guests. There are also numerous other properties in the village which are available on Airbnb and VRBO and there are some lovely hotels in Souillac which is just five minutes away. In addition, there is a pretty campsite/glampsite a fifteen minute walk from the Château.

We are ideally located on the outskirts of a rural village, with stunning views of the Dordogne Valley, but remain within easy reach of shops and restaurants. The nearest airport, Brive, is just half an hour from the Chateau, with Bergerac, Limoges, Bordeaux and Toulouse Airports all being great options as well. If travelling by train, Souillac is on the direct line south from Paris and road links are very good in the area.

The Estate offers many beautiful options for your event. Hold your ceremony under our romantic archway, with an aisle lined with cypress trees, then head to the lawn for an elegant cocktail reception beneath the Château's medieval circular tower. In the Maison Garden, there is ample room for dining for up to 90 people should you wish.

Inside, we have the dining hall and library, which offer excellent Plan B options, as well as the main hall upstairs in the Maison which can be used for dining, your ceremony, dancing or canapés and can accommodate up to 70 seated guests. The Maison Hall is also equipped with a PA system which you will have access to throughout your stay.

In terms of catering, we can help arrange this for you throughout your stay as well as on the wedding day itself. We can help you liaise with suppliers and also provide suggestions and support for the rest of your stay as well.

We also have a list of recommended suppliers which will help guide you. At Château du Raysse we are entirely flexible and so can offer as much or as little support as you require - meaning you have the freedom and flexibility to do whatever you wish to make your event just perfect.

[Recommended suppliers](https://chateauduraysse.com/recommended-dordogne-wedding-suppliers/)

In addition, if you would prefer a complete package, we can also provide this for you. This can be adapted to your budget, style and guest numbers. This is provided by Julie <julie@yourweddingplanner.fr>.

**Pricing & availability**

Our pricing is usually based on full access to the Château for one week (including complete exclusivity, concierge service, linen and towels and cleaning fee) as this offers best value for our guests and plenty of time to relax and enjoy the area. However, we can certainly be flexible to your requirements.

The prices would be as follows:

**2025/2026**

| Period | 3 nights | 4 nights | 5 nights | 7 nights |
|---------|-----------|-----------|-----------|----------|
| March | €9,500.00 | €12,200.00 | €13,600.00 | €15,200.00 |
| April | €9,900.00 | €12,900.00 | €13,900.00 | €15,900.00 |
| May | €11,100.00 | €13,800.00 | €14,500.00 | €16,900.00 |
| June | €11,900.00 | €14,600.00 | €15,300.00 | €17,800.00 |
| July | €12,400.00 | €15,800.00 | €17,300.00 | €19,600.00 |
| August | €14,300.00 | €17,500.00 | €18,700.00 | €21,900.00 |
| September | €12,400.00 | €15,800.00 | €17,300.00 | €19,600.00 |
| October | €11,100.00 | €14,600.00 | €15,300.00 | €17,800.00 |

**2026 Availability:**
- 17-21 April 2026: Up to 4 nights available
- 4-8 May 2026: 3 nights available
- 11-14 May 2026: 3 nights available
- 10-13 June 2026: 3 nights available
- 14-22 July 2026: Any dates available
- 7-12 August 2026: Up to 5 nights available
- 17-27 August 2026: Up to 10 nights available
- 31 August - 5 September 2026: Up to 5 nights available
- 12 September - 23 October 2026: Any dates available

**2027 Availability:**
- 1 April - 29 May 2027: Any dates available
- 1-10 June 2027: Any dates available
- 13-24 June 2027: Any dates available
- 28 June - 26 July 2027: Any dates available
- 30 July - 8 September 2027: Any dates available
- 14 September - 4 October 2027: Any dates available
- 11-31 October 2027: Any dates available

Bookings are now open for 2028 as well.

**Les Étangs des Vignes** is a magical atmosphere that blends rustic charm with modern elegance, surrounded by an enchanting forest and shimmering ponds. A romantic setting that feels like an intimate escape from the world.

Concept:
- A large number of accommodations on-site and nearby
- A fully equipped venue for your reception
- Complete freedom to choose your own vendors
- Personalized guidance throughout the planning process
- A selection of trusted and experienced vendors
- A setting where you'll feel "just like home" for an entire weekend

Services Included:

**Accommodations (Capacity: 45 Guests)**
- **La Maison des Vignes**: 4 bedrooms, 4 bathrooms (8 guests), a fully equipped kitchen, and a large dining room
- **8 Cottages**: Each with 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms (35 guests total)
- **1 Bridal Cottage**: 1 bedroom and 1 bathroom (2 guests)
- High-quality linens and towels provided
- End-of-stay cleaning included

**Reception Spaces**
- A **280 m² nomad tent** for your reception, with a dance floor and fully equipped with sound & lighting systems, video projector, and microphones
- Catering area and nearby restrooms
- Reception furniture (round and rectangular tables, chairs, coffee tables, sofas, deck chairs)
- Outdoor ceremony area with wooden benches and a charming archway
- Cocktail area with stunning views of the ponds

**Additional Facilities & Services**
- Infinity pool with a panoramic view of the ponds
- WiFi
- On-site parking
- Event insurance included
- A dedicated contact person throughout the planning process
- A "Guardian Angel" present during your entire event

**Tariff and Availability**
For **2027**, the weekend package (2 nights – Friday 4 PM to Sunday 4 PM) including all services mentioned above is **€12,000 TTC**.

**AVAILABILITY AND TIME OF STAY**
Available week ends:
- Sept 2026: 11-13, 18-20
- October 2026: 2-4, 9-11
- May 2027: 7-9, 21-23
- June 2027: 4-6, 11-13

For a wedding in a week end, the time of stay must be of at least two nights, from 4pm on the Friday to 4pm on the Sunday. It is possible to extend the duration of your stay for 1 or 2 nights more around the week end.

**CAPACITY FOR RECEPTION / ACCOMMODATION**
- The ceremony, cocktail and outside dinner in the olive grove spaces can accommodate up to 120 people, children included. Under tents previously installed the capacity is of 50 people. If needed, the capacity under tents for a dinner can be extended up to 120 people.
- On location, there are 13 bedrooms that can accommodate up to 29 people, including one master suite for the bride and groom and ten bathrooms, divided into three independent houses. They are still very close to each other and there also and to the shared living spaces.
- Extra guests can be accommodated close to the Domain, in hotels, B&B or holidays houses around, at less than 4 km from the venue. A taxi service is possible all along your stay and especially during the wedding night.
- Option to rent neighbour's house with pool at 1 min by foot to the venue, in the same hamlet. This house can accommodate 15 people. In total, 44 people could be hosted on site (29+15).

**SERVICE PROVIDERS**
The venue has been organizing more than 20 weddings a year for the past 12 years and works closely with quality professionals including caterers, decorators, music bands, DJs, florists, hairdressers & makeup artists, photographers, equipment renters. No service providers are imposed.

**THE EVENING BEFORE**
Possibility to have a welcome dinner at the venue with the people who are staying at the Clos (30 people) + possibly 15 people accommodated in the neighbour's house if rented.

**THE WEDDING DAY**
Different spaces within the Domain:
- Secular ceremony on the lavender terraces and under the olive trees overlooking the hamlet and the "Piscine des Lauriers-roses" (1st pool)
- Cocktail on the terrace of the "Piscine du vieux rampart" (2nd pool) with specific lighting showcasing the stone buildings at nightfall, possibility to have a band play music.
- Dinner on the "terrasse aux tentes pagodes", at the bottom of the rampart (it is possible to close this space in case of uncertain weather); the catering office is also at your disposal for the entirety of your stay.
- Dancing party until daybreak in the "Cave aux voûtains", vaulted stone room on the first floor, in close proximity of the dinner space and the lounge space.

**THE DAY AFTER**
Possibility to organize a brunch on the day after the wedding with all guests and a pool party. Food truck possible.

**FURNITURE**
Regarding furniture for the dinner, (tables and chairs), white folding chairs and tables (round or rectangular) available for rent. Different types of chairs or tables can be provided through a professional renter who can deliver everything on site.

**DINNER/CATERERS**
Caterer required for menus. Choose your own or work with regular caterers. They provide dishes, cutlery, glasses and table linen. Regarding drinks, no corkage fee for wine and champagne during dinner. Refrigerators and a refrigerated cellar in the catering office available for drinks. Contacts of local vineyards available.

**MUSIC**
DJs available who often work at the Clos. Sound equipment available on the welcoming area around the pool, on the intimate ceremony, on the cocktail area.

**PRICES**
For weddings organized at the Clos, the Domain must be privatized. The package includes renting of:
- Lodgings on the Domain (29 people)
- Different wedding spaces: to welcome your guests, for the private ceremony, for the cocktail, for the dinner and party and for the caterer office
- Shared spaces (large open kitchen for groups and a room allowing residents to eat together outside of the wedding day)
- All of the outside spaces (2 hectares grounds, parking 40 cars and the two pools)
- Lounge furniture: high stools and barrels, low chairs and coffee tables, wooden board for the caterer, wrought-iron tables and chairs… lightning garlands on the lounge area
- Sound equipment on the welcoming area around the pool, on the intimate ceremony, on the cocktail area
- The reception, setting up and coordinating of the service providers

**Price of the privatization of the entire Domain for a 2-nights wedding in a week end in September / October 2026 or in May / June 2027:**
- **September 2026: 10960 euros**
- **October 2026: 8960 euros**
- **May 2027: 9960 euros**
- **June 2027: 11960 euros**

**Additional night around the week end: €1900**

Prices are all tax included (household linen, bath towels, sheets, cleaning of the houses at the end of the stay).
- Tourist tax: 2,8 euros per person per night.
- Terms of booking: advance payment of 35% of the total rental price on the signing of the renting contract.
- Furniture option: chairs and tables for the secular ceremony and for the wedding dinner are priced at €9,8 per table and €3,7 per chair, all taxes included.

**CHECK IN / CHECK OUT**
- Stay of 2 nights: Friday- Sunday: check in at 4:00pm and check out at 4:00pm at the latest.

Benefits of the Clos d'Hullias: favored location on top of a hill with outstanding panoramic view of the valley from all wedding spaces welcoming the ceremony, the reception, the cocktail and the dinner. All in the middle of natural forests, vineyards and olive trees. Different spaces throughout the day, each with its own atmosphere, in a private setting with old stones filled with charm.

**CHÂTEAU DE LA COURONNE WEDDING BROCHURE**

Château de la Couronne is a fairytale-like venue providing the ultimate setting for a luxurious wedding weekend. Enjoy the exclusive use of the château and its expansive 5-acre grounds, offering complete privacy for your celebration. The venue works closely with a select group of wedding planners and expert caterers to ensure every aspect is flawlessly executed.

Recently renovated, the Château has restored its French charm and elegance while retaining the warmth of a cherished family home.

**LOCATION**
Nestled in the southwest of France, near the Charente and Dordogne regions, the Château is just an hour's drive from the nearest airport and 25 minutes from Angoulême. Easy access to Bordeaux (30 minutes) and Paris (1hr45) via high-speed train.

**MINIMUM REQUIREMENTS**
Minimum of 70 adult guests (plus any children) for celebrations at the château or alternatively, a minimum spend of €50,000 on venue, food and drink across the weekend.

**THE CHÂTEAU**
Elegant salons for socialising and relaxing — from the grand banquet hall and stylish Chandelier Bar to intimate spaces like the drawing room, billiard room, and private cinema. The estate accommodates up to 39 guests, with each bedroom equipped with air-conditioning, tea and coffee facilities, hairdryers, toiletries, and bath and pool towels. All accommodations are reserved exclusively for wedding events. Additional options are available nearby for guests.

**ACCOMMODATIONS**
- **The Château**: Sleeps up to 24 people
- **The Coach House**: Sleeps up to 10 people
- **The Garden Suite**: Sleeps up to 5 people (Ground floor with disabled access)

**CAPACITY**
The Château can seat up to 100 wedding guests inside the banquet and up to 500 seated wedding guests outside.

**WEDDING WEEKEND**

**ARRIVAL SOIRÉE**
Informal arrival party with drinks and sharing boards in the courtyard.

**WEDDING DAY**
Celebration with close family and friends.

**POOL PARTY**
Post wedding celebration set in the gardens where guests can enjoy drinks on the terrace, poolside pizzas followed by an evening barbecue. All wedding guests are invited.

**VENUE PACKAGE INCLUDES**
- Exclusivity of the estate, including the Chateau, grounds and swimming pool
- Three nights stay for up to 39 people
- Wedding day brunch and post-wedding breakfast for all staying guests
- The banquet hall is available in case of bad weather, seating up to 100 people
- Use of tables, chairs, portable bar, sun loungers, parasols and access to a variety of props
- Staffing for the duration of the events. (Excludes set up and clear down on wedding day, managed by your wedding planner)

**VENUE PACKAGE PRICING**
2026: €24,950 | €26,950* (*High season June - September & bank holidays)
2027: €26,950 | €28,950* (*High season June - September & bank holidays)

Prices are accurate at the time of quoting but may change. Any updates will be reflected in the brochure.
Minimum 70 adults (plus children) or €50,000 spend covering venue, food, and drink for three days.

**CATERING & BAR**
Private catering team exclusive to Château de la Couronne. Variety of dining and beverage experiences.

**CATERING PACKAGE EXAMPLE:**

**ARRIVAL SOIRÉE**
Signature drink and canapés, followed by an interactive live pizza station.

**WEDDING DAY**
Elegant cocktail reception, delicious three-course wedding meal paired with French table wines, champagne tower, late-night munchies and a signature shot on the dance floor.

**POOL PARTY**
Free-flowing mimosas by the pool, hotdog and ice cream, afternoon BBQ feast.

The Château's Chandelier Bar serves a selection of spritz cocktails, French wines, beers, premium spirits, as well as regional Champagnes and Crémants.
Château Canon is not available for private events.

**CHÂTEAU DE TILLY**

The evening takes place entirely in the Castle which is privatized for weddings.

**LOCATION**
The domain is located in the heart of the country of Normandy:
- 1h30 from Paris and 25 minutes from Rouen

**ACCOMMODATIONS**
- 23 rooms or 66 guests who can sleep
- Hotels and guest houses 10 minutes around

**PRIVATIZATION**
Privatize the domain for the weekend. Free to choose your providers from the venue's list.

**AVAILABILITY**
Availabilities for your desired date.

**DURATION**
During the weeks, the week-end, 3 days or more, all weddings are possible in the Château de Tilly.

**RECEPTION SPACES**
Two places to receive guests:
- In the castle (90 person / room)
- "l'Orangerie" (300 person seated)

**PRICING**
For a unique price: exclusivity of the castle, the room and the chairs & table.
- €14,900 for the privatization of the domain from October to April, for the week-end
- €16,900 for the summer, for the week-end
- All inclusive formula also available

**PHOTOS**
Pictures on [Instagram](https://kor01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.instagram.com%2Fchateaudetilly%2F&data=05%7C02%7C%7C8fbb3aa49ace4515d24a08ddfff28a36%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C638948139376391846%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=ja07KnzKImosGL1m2plGrGN4Q3xgmwKeR64BNW0VNg0%3D&reserved=0) or on the website [here](https://kor01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fchateaudetilly.fr%2Fphotos-3%2Fphotos-mariages%2F&data=05%7C02%7C%7C8fbb3aa49ace4515d24a08ddfff28a36%7C84df9e7fe9f640afb435aaaaaaaaaaaa%7C1%7C0%7C638948139376430087%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJFbXB0eU1hcGkiOnRydWUsIlYiOiIwLjAuMDAwMCIsIlAiOiJXaW4zMiIsIkFOIjoiTWFpbCIsIldUIjoyfQ%3D%3D%7C0%7C%7C%7C&sdata=gHIVAudSPmW7cTXHbeain03FvKMx3GJ1D4Ly1xs2ju8%3D&reserved=0).

**HISTORY**
Historic Monument, dating from the 16th century, which has been completely renovated.

This is a wedding request inquiry for La Bastide de Laurence.

[La Bastide de Laurence - Wedding Brochure - 2026](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1R1DJgzIuEsmgiFgjOw1KON_3WIhmtvMV/view?usp=sharing) describes the property in detail and outlines the packages available. [La Bastide de Laurence - Weddings - Drone Footage](https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1y2KGk5XyDO3mrY1676ArgWmre4FToHhx?usp=sharing). Featured in British Vogue.

This stunning 8 guest suite home is available to rent in its entirety and typically generally available for one week stays (Friday-Friday). For reservations planning an event of 40 guests or fewer, our "Live the Bastide" program offers two additional options on select dates between September to May;
-"Weekend" (3 nights starting on Friday)
-"Midweek" (3 nights, Tues-Fri)

**2026 rates for 2027 reservations.**

Availability for 2027:

08 Jan - 15 Jan  at  €22,605*
12 Feb - 19 Feb at  €22,605*
05 Mar - 12 Mar at  €22,605*
23 Apr - 30 Apr at  €22,605*
07 May - 14 May at €24,750**
21 May - 28 May at €24,750**
11 Jun - 18 Jun at €28.990
16 July - 23 July at €28.990
23 July - 30 July at €28.990
30 Jul - 06 Aug at €28.990
06 Aug - 13 Aug at €28.990
13 Aug - 20 Aug at €28.990
20 Aug - 27 Aug at €28.990
03 Sept - 10 Sept at  €24,750**
24 Sept - 01 Oct at  €24,750*
08 Oct - 15 Oct at  €22,605*
26 Nov - 03 Dec at €22,605*
10 Dec - 17 Dec at €22,605*

* - 3 nights may be chosen for this week; Fri-Mon €18,605 or Tues-Fri €15,940 (possibility of adding 4th night)
** - 3 nights may be chosen for this week; Fri-Mon €19.120 or Tues-Fri €16,965 (possibility of adding 4th night)

_Rates do not include local "taxe de sejour" which is €4.80 per night per adult_

Additional Information:
- The property is well equipped for a luxury vacation. The home is meticulous and has just reopened after an extensive, 5 star renovation.
- The home has 8 stunning, private guest rooms each with their own ensuite
- There is also a studio with separate entrance, a double pull-out sofa, kitchenette and full bathroom (supplemental €200/night)
- All staple house supplies fully stocked. Toiletries are all by the iconic L'Occitane.
- Welcome with charcuterie, crudités, luscious local fruit, the infamous French baguettes and Provençal rosé wine sufficient for the number of guests who are staying at the property (up to 16).
- Instagram [@bastidedelaurence](https://www.instagram.com/bastidedelaurence/) or [www.labastidelaurence.com](http://www.labastidelaurence.com/)
- Recent article [La Bastide de Laurence - Design Blog Feature](https://www.hellolovelystudio.com/2024/01/la-bastide-de-laurence.html)
- The Bastide is situated just outside the renowned town of L'Isle-sur-la-Sorgue - well known for its Sunday markets, known as the antique capital of France, and is often referred to as the "little Venice" of France because of its unique canals. All of the popular Luberon and Vaucluse regions of Provence are within walking, biking or short driving distance, and 45 mins from the sea and Marignane International Airport (MRS).
- Full complement of recommended service providers provided in Welcome Guide, covering all aspects; chefs, caterers, transportation, etc.

2026 fully reserved. Peak season weeks are booked well in advance.

No wedding brochure available. Website at [www.chateau-de-la-gravette.com](http://www.chateau-de-la-gravette.com/) shows the rates for 2026. Rates are for a weekly holiday rental from Saturday to Saturday. For weddings, 2 weeks rental required so that the wedding can take place over the middle weekend. 2 days at the start of the wedding rental to prepare the barn (convert it from a games / family space to a wedding venue) and another 2 days at the end to convert it back. Check in on the Monday and check out on the Thursday 10 days later. No extra charges for hosting the wedding. Maximum number of guests staying at the property is 15 and the barn and garden is left empty for you to furnish and decorate as you like. No involvement in the wedding preparations, e.g. catering, flowers, entertainment, etc. Wedding planner required to arrange all of these services.

September next year availability. Weekly rate for the first 2 weeks of September is £6350 per week and the last 2 weeks of September is £4800 per week.

Recommended wedding planner: Karen at [www.perfectday-bykaren.com](http://www.perfectday-bykaren.com/)

Availability for both autumn 2026 and Spring 2027, although autumn is recommended, as the weather is generally less rainy and the fall colours are magnificent. Plus the château, which would be privatized for your wedding, is warmer, since the thick walls have absorbed the warmth from the summer.
 
Each wedding is tailor made.
 
 
For weddings, the entire château for you, for 2 full days. Including accommodation for up to 20 guests sharing rooms (10 en suite double/king size rooms, 2 of which are suites with an adjoining single room, and 3 of which can also be made up with twin beds, plus one single room and a double room of lesser quality on the second floor)
The price is 12’000 € for both nights, including daily breakfast and full use of all four reception rooms, as well as the family chapel, and also including basic floral arrangements and all the tables and chairs and plates/glasses/cutlery for your wedding reception.
 
You need to add on the caterer (we have a list of 3 highly recommended, but can also work with one of your choice if you prefer), the champagne, the wines (can recommend a few excellently priced good vintners if you wish), the DJ/ orchestra and photographer if you wish (can recommend these as well), extra floral arrangements, wedding cake etc. Can also arrange for rental cars (partnered with Audi), an amazing classic Daimler long for the wedding, a horse and carriage, and of course chauffeur transfers with vans or mini buses.
 
It is also possible to have a barnum in the garden, looking on to the château, but this comes at an extra cost of around 4’000 € if chosen.
 
For other guests, there is a hotel/motel in the next village, Saint Calais, with rooms around 100 e per night, plus another chateau with 11 rooms and yet another with 8 rooms, of higher quality (priced around 400-500 € per night), 20 minutes drive away.

**The Domaine de Vavril, a concept of an exclusive stay during 3 nights and 4 days !**

The Domaine is fully dedicated to you. You can enjoy the nice atmosphere of this exclusive place.

**Rates for your wedding at the Domaine** **in 2027 **:
- **The reception halls and all the outdoor spaces, during 3 nights and 4 days** : 7 500€_ _(June to september) / 5 700€ (May and october) / 4 500€ (April) / 3 900€ (January to march, november and december)
_- The fully equipped reception room, which can accommodate up to 150 guests for a seated dinner (or 120 with dancefloor), with no time limit_
_- The room of the old wine press and the voulted cave_
_- The terrace with vineyards view with its elegant pellet patio heaters_
_- Outdoor spaces and terraces, perfect for a symbolic ceremony or an open-air cocktail_
_- The heated swimming pool (depending on the season)_
_- Cleaning included_
_- Heating included_
- **  Accommodation on several buildings, for 41 guests, during 3 nights** : 12 300€ (June to september - About 100€/pers/night) / 10 100€ (May and october - About 82€/pers/nigh) / 7 400 € (April - About 60€/pers/night) / 5 900€ (January to march, november and december - About 48€/pers/night)
_- The Master's Residence, which combines refinement, charm and comfort, with its magnificent suite of the bride and groom and its other family suites. It can accomodate up to 20 people (9 rooms, including 5 double rooms)_
_- The Vineyard Apartment, ideal for your witnesses, friends or for a family. It can accomodate 6 people_
_- The two harvest cottages, which can accomodate 15 people_
_- Linen and towels included_
_- Cleaning included_
_- City tax included_
_- Heating included_

For your stay, you have the choice between an arrival on Thursday at 14h and a departure on Sunday at 16h, or an arrival on Friday at 14h and a departure on Monday at 16h.

For the catering, you must choose one of [our carterers](https://vavril.fr/en/weddings/#traiteurs) : <https://vavril.fr/en/weddings/#traiteurs>

We can also recommend trusted wedding planners (english spoken) who know the Domaine inside out, or simply advise you on reliable service providers if you wish to organise your wedding yourself.

**The "little extra" of the Domaine de Vavril !**
- Our Organization service offers you 2 hours of personalized advice, to help you in organizing your wedding and to guide you in your choice of service providers.
- Free wine tasting, to discover the wines of the Domaine, on request and according to availability of our winegrower.

Visit our website www.vavril.fr, you will discover the history of the Domaine and our photo gallery.
Here is our [booking calendar](https://vavril.fr/en/availability-calendar/) if you want to check our availabilities :.

Visit also our [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Domaine-de-Vavril/131169700278948), [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/domainedevavril/) & [Pinterest](https://fr.pinterest.com/domainedevavril/) pages for more wedding ideas !
